title: Can i get Free Tristana and Riot Girl Tristana?
body: Can i get it?  Free Tristana and Riot Girl Tristana?

replies.body:
Dreadnight Garen and Riot Girl Tristana are both still avalible

However, you'll have to send in a support ticket to get unchained alistar

If you're having issues getting the reward from the Facebook promotion, just hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll do our best to help! :)

Let me know if you have any questions.
If I remember correctly the Facebook and twitter link still work however for unchained alistar, I would suggest you delve a bit further deep into the boards.
